meanings.definition: A slang term for the resinous trichomes of cannabis plants.
meanings.sent1: The keefs on the cannabis plant are sticky and fragrant.
meanings.sent2: I collected some keefs from the cannabis buds for a special recipe.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added too many keefs to the dish, making it extra potent.
meanings.sent4: The keefs glistened like tiny crystals under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh keefs filled the room, creating a relaxing atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The act of collecting or producing keefs.
meanings.sent1: His job at the farm involved the keefs extraction process.
meanings.sent2: The keefs production increased significantly after the new equipment was installed.
meanings.sent3: She joked that keefs collecting should be an Olympic sport.
meanings.sent4: The sound of keefs being collected was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent5: The market demand for high-quality keefs was on the rise.

meanings.definition: To sprinkle or add keefs to a joint or bowl of cannabis.
meanings.sent1: He carefully keefs the joint before lighting it up.
meanings.sent2: She always keefs her bowl for an enhanced smoking experience.
meanings.sent3: The friends laughed as he tried to keefs the joint without spilling any.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly keefed cannabis filled the room.
meanings.sent5: She skillfully keefs the bowl, ensuring an even distribution of flavor.
